titles.title: A resolution notifying the President of the United States of the election of the Secretary of the Senate.
A resolution notifying the President of the United States of the election of the Secretary of the Senate.

vote.text: Submitted in the Senate, considered, and agreed to without amendment by Unanimous Consent.

term.name: Presidents and presidential powers, Vice Presidents

bill.summary: This resolution notifies the President of the United States of the election of the Honorable Sonceria Ann Berry as Secretary of the Senate.
